attributes.action: legislate for all shops to provide minimum counter /checkout space for customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people including the elderly struggle with their groceries etc. because shopkeepers provide too small an area of counter for customers to empty their baskets. Lottery advertising and other obstacles also cause difficulties. A clear unobstructed flat area of at least 0.5 sq. metres per checkout should be provided.
